entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 11 with temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
